description: This file defines a Flutter widget page for displaying and interacting with a list of mantras, including selection, display details, and japa count controls.

classes.name: MantraPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the page where users can view and interact with mantras.

classes.name: _MantraPageState
classes.description: The state class for MantraPage managing widget state, including selected mantra and japa count.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the list of mantras and sets the default selected mantra.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI, including list of mantras, details card, and control buttons.
